refactor.description: Changes which neither fix a bug nor add a feature

feat.description: Changes which introduce a new feature

build.description: Changes which affect the build system or external dependencies.

style.description: Changes which don't affect code logic, such as white-spaces, formatting, missing semi-colons

test.description: Changes which add missing tests or correct existing tests

ci.description:
Changes which affect CI configuration files and scripts.
Example scopes: travis, circle, browser-stack, sauce-labs

revert.description: Changes which revert a previous commit

filesystem.description: deals with server folder / file layout

storegen.description: storage and world generation module, deals with storage and world gen

comm.description: communication module, deals with communication with client

chassis.description: chassis module, deals with supporting everything else

threading.description: threading modules, manages executors and thread pools

datacompiler.description: changes to the datacompiler codegen plugin

common.description: changes to the common subproject, used to place common stuff from nukkit that are shared by datacompiler & server project

footerTypes.name: BREAKING-CHANGE
footerTypes.description: The commit introduces breaking API changes

footerTypes.name: Closes
footerTypes.description: The commit closes issues or pull requests

footerTypes.name: Co-authored-by
footerTypes.description:
The commit is co-authored by another person.
For multiple people use one line each

footerTypes.name: Refs
footerTypes.description:
The commit references other commits by their hash ID.
For multiple hash IDs use a comma as separator
